Epilepsy is one are of two types: convulsive and non-convulsive. Non-convulsive of the most common neurological disorders and with proper epilepsy has features such as change in mental status while con- treatment, can be well controlled in the majority of people. vulsive epilepsy has features such as sudden abnormal movements, including stiffening and shaking of the body.
